summary: TypeScript SDK has multiple deprecated npm dependencies causing warnings during installation. Includes outdated packages like source-map tools, uuid v3, request, and core-js v2 that need upgrades.
userImpact: Users see numerous npm warnings during installation, creating noise and potential security concerns from using outdated packages.
rootCause: Dependencies have not been updated to their latest versions; transitive dependencies include packages no longer actively maintained or recommended.
proposedFix: Upgrade all deprecated dependencies to their current versions, particularly fsevents (v2), chokidar (v3), uuid (v7+), and replace request with alternatives.
resolutionDetails: Dependencies were pruned and updated as part of issue #1330.
keyQuote: Pruned all dependencies as part of #1330.
